name: GGX- Great Grandma Escape
description:
You play as Granny, is a very strong and family oriented old lady who is placed into the hospital, for observational purposes.

HIGHLIGHTS:

  • Spectacular physics
  • Dazzling visuals
  • Intuitive controls
  • Power Granny up

Learn more about Great Grandma Escape at http://www.greatgrandmaescape.com or visit us at https://www.facebook.com/GGXGreatGrandmaEscape1 and https://twitter.com/GGXGreatGrandma
